## PlayerCameraEventPayloads."PLAYER\_CAMERA.FACE\_POSITION" property

Emitted when the camera faces a position (one-time rotation).

**Signature:**

```typescript
[PlayerCameraEvent.FACE_POSITION]: {
        playerCamera: PlayerCamera;
        position: Vector3Like;
    };
```
